trans-unit.source: The exception thrown when an invalid COM object is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用無效的 COM 物件時便擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An `InvalidComObjectException` is thrown when an invalid COM object is used.
trans-unit.target: `InvalidComObjectException`使用無效的 COM 物件時就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This happens when the `__ComObject` type is used directly, without having a backing class factory.
trans-unit.target: 發生這種情況時`__ComObject`類型會直接使用，而不需要支援 class factory。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Type.IsCOMObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Type.IsCOMObject%2A>。

trans-unit.source: `InvalidComObjectException` uses the HRESULT COR_E_INVALIDCOMOBJECT which has the value 0x80131527.
trans-unit.target: `InvalidComObjectException` 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_INVALIDCOMOBJECT 0x80131527 的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see langword="InvalidComObjectException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="InvalidComObjectException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see langword="InvalidComObjectException" /> with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性，初始化 <see langword="InvalidComObjectException" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: `InvalidComObjectException` inherits from <xref:System.SystemException>.
trans-unit.target: `InvalidComObjectException` 繼承自 <xref:System.SystemException>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the <xref:System.Exception> object as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定的屬性<xref:System.Exception>物件下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Property Type
trans-unit.target: 屬性類型

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: A localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The message that indicates the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 訊息，表示例外狀況的原因。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see langword="InvalidComObjectException" /> with a message.
trans-unit.target: 使用訊息，初始化 <see langword="InvalidComObjectException" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: `InvalidComObjectException` inherits from <xref:System.SystemException>.
trans-unit.target: `InvalidComObjectException` 繼承自 <xref:System.SystemException>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the <xref:System.Exception> object as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定的屬性<xref:System.Exception>物件下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Property Type
trans-unit.target: 屬性類型

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="COMException" /> class from serialization data.
trans-unit.target: 從序列化 (Serialization) 資料，初始化 <see langword="COMException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>。

trans-unit.source: `InvalidComObjectException` inherits from <xref:System.SystemException>.
trans-unit.target: `InvalidComObjectException` 繼承自 <xref:System.SystemException>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="info" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外狀況的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.InvalidComObjectException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.InvalidComObjectException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.InvalidComObjectException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.InvalidComObjectException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
